name: PolyKart
description:
PolyKart is a racing game develop by Nikuya, a team of 4 students including me in the second year of my study in Poly3D. I was the leader programmation of the team and I programme the majority of the game.

This game was made in 7 weeks with each week a devlog was post on Facebook  on Poly3D page.

What is PolyKart ?

PolyKart is a racing game with 8 players maximum. Each player is equipe with a special gun with different effect to fight the other player. Each minute the last player is eliminated but even thought  his eliminate, he can always interact with the obstacle on the race circuit to block the other player. The last player alive will win the race.
